LanguageData.I_EMLeech.label: claretous leech
LanguageData.I_EMLeech.description: Originally bred to resist most common diseases, the claretous leech now thrives in undisturbed pools and are useful for their blood sucking - improving ones ability to fend off disease and to numb pain.
LanguageData.I_EMSBandage.label: simple bandage
LanguageData.I_EMSBandage.description: Simple cloth bandage, useful for holding things against the body and not much else.
